headline.main: A CHINA WALL REMARK NIXON COULDN'T MAKE

results.snippet: To the Editor:    Here's a p.p.s. to your p.s. (Topics March 20) re the Great Wall of China and its reported visibility from space: Eleven years ago, I had just joined the White House writing staff, headed by Raymond K. Price Jr. Shortly after my...
results.lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Here's a p.p.s. to your p.s. (Topics March 20) re the Great Wall of China and its reported visibility from space: Eleven years ago, I had just joined the White House writing staff, headed by Raymond K. Price Jr. Shortly after my arrival, the Presidential party took off for its historic breakthrough visit to the Peoples Republic of China.
